The information provided on the appis not intended for distribution to oruse by any person or entity in any jursdiction or country where such distribtion or use would be contrary to law oregulation or which would subject us or any registration requirement within such jurisdiction or country. Accordingy, those persons who choose to access the app from other locations do so on their own initiative and are solely responsible for compliance with local laws, if users who are minors in the juridicion in which they reside (generally under the age of 18)  must have the permission of, and be directly supervisedby, their parent or guardian to use the pp. If you are a minor, you must have your parent or guardian read and agree to these terms of use prior to you using the app.
AboutUsText1: Judan is an application used to provide well-structured platform for both trainee and trainers so they can communicate and and schedule training session anywhere and anytime.
AboutUsText2: Many talented people are willing to make an income out of their talents. Either by teaching them or performing them as a service, they sometimes face difficulties finding an appropriate platform that gives them the options of working on the Internet or face to face, self-marketing features and most importantly is to be expanded to include all kinds of talents. People who are interested in improving these talents are also struggling to find the perfect match trainer who can fulfill their needs with a reasonable price and satisfying professionalism. Therefore, Judan is was the best choice.
